languages.text: "Вижу, ты исполнен верности к флагману и династии. Вставай и продолжай служить мне, направляя местных".
"I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."
languages.original_text: "Вижу, ты исполнен верности к флагману и династии. Вставай и продолжай служить мне, направляя местных".

traits.locale_text: "I see you are full of loyalty to my flagship and my House. Get up and continue your service to me in giving guidance to the locals."
"I see you are full of loyalty to my flagship and my House. Get up and continue your service to me in giving guidance to the locals."
"I see you are a paragon of loyalty to my flagship and my House. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."
"I see you are a paragon of loyalty to my flagship and my House. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."
"I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."
"I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."

languages.text: «Veo que es leal a mi nave y a mi casa. Levántese y continúe su servicio guiando a los demás plebeyos».
languages.original_text: "I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que es leal a mi nave y a mi casa. Levántese y continúe su servicio guiando a los demás plebeyos».

languages.text: 「なるほど、私の船と家に忠誠を誓っているようだ。立ち上がり、現地民たちを導くことで、私への奉仕を続けることだな」
languages.original_text: "I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほど、私の船と家に忠誠を誓っているようだ。立ち上がり、現地民たちを導くことで、私への奉仕を続けることだな」

languages.text: “看得出来，你对我的舰船、我的家族确实忠心耿耿。站起身吧，继续服侍我，引导这里的人们吧。”
languages.original_text: "I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，你对我的舰船、我的家族确实忠心耿耿。站起身吧，继续服侍我，引导这里的人们吧。”

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, seid Ihr meinem Schiff und meinem Haus gegenüber tatsächlich loyal. Erhebt Euch und dient mir weiterhin, indem Ihr die Einheimischen anleitet."
languages.original_text: "I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, seid Ihr meinem Schiff und meinem Haus gegenüber tatsächlich loyal. Erhebt Euch und dient mir weiterhin, indem Ihr die Einheimischen anleitet."

languages.text: « Je vois que votre loyauté envers mon vaisseau et ma maison est indéfectible. Relevez-vous, et continuez à me servir en guidant ces pauvres gens. »
languages.original_text: "I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que votre loyauté envers mon vaisseau et ma maison est indéfectible. Relevez-vous, et continuez à me servir en guidant ces pauvres gens. »

languages.text: "Görüyorum ki gemime ve haneme hakikaten sadıksın. Ayağa kalk ve sakinlere yol göstererek bana hizmeti sürdür."
languages.original_text: "I see you are indeed loyal to my ship and my house. Get up and continue your service to me by giving guidance to the locals."
